def check_job_queue(self, queue_url, job_id): """ Polls an Amazon SQS queue for messages that indicate a specified Textract job has completed.
:param queue_url: The URL of the Amazon SQS queue to poll. :param job_id: The ID of the Textract job. :return: The status of the job. """ status = None try: queue = self.sqs_resource.Queue(queue_url) messages = queue.receive_messages() if messages: msg_body = json.loads(messages[0].body) msg = json.loads(msg_body['Message']) if msg.get('JobId') == job_id: messages[0].delete() status = msg.get('Status') logger.info( "Got message %s with status %s.", messages[0].message_id, status) else: logger.info("No messages in queue %s.", queue_url) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't get messages from queue %s.", queue_url) else: return status
